summary: A configuration container for the TVLT multimodal transformer model, encapsulating all architectural hyperparameters for processing image and audio data, including patch sizes, channel counts, transformer encoder and decoder dimensions, dropout rates, masking ratios, and pretraining task flags.
business_intent: Enables developers to define and customize the structure and training behavior of a vision‑audio transformer model, allowing easy instantiation, fine‑tuning, and deployment of TVLT models for multimodal tasks.
